    Namespace: Mapsui.Widgets.ButtonWidgets
    Assembly: Mapsui.dll
    Syntax
    public class IconButtonWidget : BoxWidget, IWidget
    Remarks

    With this, the user could add buttons with SVG icons to the map.

    Usage To show a IconButtonWidget, add a instance of the IconButtonWidget to Map.Widgets by

    map.Widgets.Add(new IconButtonWidget(map, picture));

    Customize Picture: SVG image to display for button Rotation: Value for rotation in degrees Opacity: Opacity of button
